amendment.description: Amendment redirects $6,250,000 in funding for the National Institute of Environmental Health Sciences under the National Institute of Health in order to support research into the impact of red tide and other Harmful Algal Blooms on human health.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 18 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to increase and decrease by $6,250,000 the funding for the National Institute of Environmental Health Sciences under the National Institute of Health in order to support research into the impact of red tide and other Harmful Algal Blooms on human health.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Buchanan amendment (A018) Agreed to by recorded vote: 401 - 23 (Roll no. 268).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Buchanan amendment (A018) Agreed to by recorded vote: 401 - 23 (Roll no. 268).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Buchanan.
